import 'dart:io'; void main() { // Ask user for input print("Enter a year:"); int year = int.parse(stdin.readLineSync()!); // Check if the year is a leap year if (isLeapYear(year)) { print("$year is a leap year."); } else { print("$year is not a leap year."); } } // Function to check if a year is a leap year bool isLeapYear(int year) { // A leap year is divisible by 4, but not divisible by 100 unless divisible by 400 return (year % 4 == 0 && year % 100 != 0) || (year % 400 == 0); }
